snippet: Jim Balsillie, the former co-chief executive and co-chairman of BlackBerry, has sold all of his shares in the struggling company, according to a regulatory filing, Ian Austen reports on the Bits blog of The New York Times.
abstract: Jim Balsillie, the former co-chief executive and co-chairman of BlackBerry, has sold all of his shares in the struggling company, according to a regulatory filing, Ian Austen reports on the Bits blog of The New York Times.
